entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IOS build failed with "You may also need to include 'iossimulator-x64' in your project's RuntimeIdentifiers" #23352
  • .Net MAUI Binidng inside Collectinview Inside Datatemplate Inside ResourceDictionary #23350
  • FontImage markup extension doesn't allow AppThemeBinding #23347
  • Image IsVisible Binding does not work when Shadow applied #23344
  • [Android] Crash when running release mode #23342
  • Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #23333
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I4_ Selection - Click the 'Single pre-selection for Vertical list ' item will throw an exception: Object reference not set to an instance of an object #23332
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I5_EmptyView - The data template selector cannot display the correct string. #23330
    Backlog

Closed

  • Spurious 'Must declare Runtime Identifier triggered' when linking to platform dependent libraries #15436
  • Valid CSS not parsed correctly, breaks app #18056
  • Suspending an iOS app while debugging will lock up the app #23340
  • CodesignEntitlements doesn't seem to work in project #23045
  • Cannot use Shared Project with MAUI #23260
  • [MAUI]I5-EmptyView- filter not responding. #23301
  • [MAUI] I4_ Selection - The default items not highlight in Single Pre-selection and Multiple Pre-selection Page #23299
  • [MAUI] I2_Spacing - Changing the vertical and horizontal spacing values, images and location are truncated #23310
  • [MAUI] I1_Layout - Horoizontal grid for DataTemplate & Horoizontal grid for Text pages display only three-rows grid. #23303
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout-The window height on MacCatalyst must be adjusted to the maximum to scroll horizontally #23306
  • Debugging MAUI gives "Could not found a valid Xcode app bundle at..." #23326
  • Poor performance in debug mode under iOS and Android #12508
  • IOS: PDF Readers are not shown in open in menu #23083

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • [DO-NOT-MERGE] Update to newer android/emsdk dependencies for net9p6 #23353
    do-not-merge
  • Bump Appium Drivers #23349
  • [Windows] `LabelHandler` - remove extra (?) line #23346
    community ✨
  • Simplify `NavigationRootManager.Connect` on the Windows platform. #23345
    community ✨
  • Navigationbar BarBackgroundColor is not updating - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar
  • Export logs before device is deleted #23334
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Obsolete Frame for NET9 in favor of Border #23184
    t/docs 📝, area-controls-frame
  • Bump Appium version to 2.11 #23337
    area-infrastructure, area-testing
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Bump Appium version to 2.11 #23339
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Bump Appium version to 2.11 #23338
    area-testing
  • [tests] test a lot more things in `MemoryTests.cs` #23324
    memory-leak 💦, testing-missing-tests
  • Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2151.40` to `1.0.2592.51` #23209
    area-blazor, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Null terminate iOS TabbedRenderer #23335

Updated

  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23328
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove duplicated CarV/ColV galleries #23190
    area-infrastructure
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `TabbedPage` #23281
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, memory-leak 💦
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `MauiWinUIWindow` #23327
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area-drawing, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Fix select-all Entry select logic #23329
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry
  • Don't let Glide clear the old image on Android ImageView unless we get an error #23313
    community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Windows] Make sure that `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` folder exists in unpackaged #23265
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Add an API for creating instances of TypedBinding #23239
    area-xaml, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Programmatically creating FormattedString Spans with GestureRecognizers causes duplicate Command runs #23238
    community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] fix TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped called multiple times on Android #23183
    community ✨, area-gestures
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items - fix #23221
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
    area-infrastructure
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Generate the Android 7 round app icon #23276
    area-single-project
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) (take 2) #22108
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
